name: 6 Lives in 60 Seconds
description:
Originally made for Ludum Dare 51.

Around 12 - 20 people die every 10 seconds.  None of us can escape death.  How will you spend the time you have left.

6 lives in 60 seconds is a minute long 2D platformer that reflects on the inevitability of death.  The game was made for the original GameBoy but is also playable in browser.

Controls:

Jump/Progress Dialog: A/ Z Key

Start Game: Start/Enter

Thank you everyone for playing!

This was my first time participating in Ludum Dare and my first time using GB Studio.  I had a lot of fun making this and definitely plan on participating again.  My schedule was packed this weekend so I didn't have too much time to work on the game but next time I'm definitely going to clear my schedule so I can make something even bigger.
